company.title: SCHACHZUG
company.description: Working in the Automotive & Technology industry for customers like Volkswagen, Å koda, Fujitsu

tasks: I have done full stack application development, such as ordering systems with logistics functionality and the digitalization of press events by creating immersive 3D environments. These projects allowed customers to explore recreated locations in a 3D world, experiencing the same interactive features as if they were there.
I was also responsible for the complete conception of digital events, leading the design and development process to ensure a seamless user experience.

My role also involved managing the IT & Development team, maintaining and setting up a new IT infrastructure (network, storage), coordinating external service vendors such as livestreaming and 3D designers.
